website_summaries.verdict: An attractive choice at an unbeatable price, yet quality is uncompromised. The best product for budget-minded consumers.
pros: Traditional shape and pleated fabric match almost any décor
Spider fitting is white to match the shade
Provides perfect amount of light shading
cons: Color may seem more "bright white" than "antique white."
Otherwise, few complaints about this well-made and affordable shade

customer_reviews.title: talk about excellent packaging, it could have survived an earthquake
customer_reviews.text: Wow, talk about excellent packaging, it could have survived an earthquake. Nice shade, decent quality. Just don't let the words Antique White fool you into thinking this is an off white or vanilla type of color. The word Antique must refer to the style because it's a bright white. Not really what I wanted but it's now on the lamp and staying there, hopefully it will darken a little over time.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful mushroom pleated lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful mushroom pleated lamp shade. I was worried that, because it said "antique white "in the description, it would be beige but it turned out to be a nice white color after all. It was priced well, arrived quickly and packed well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: As many people have mentioned, this shade was packed really (really!) well. I wanted it for a bedroom lamp and it looks good. I would have given it 5 stars if it had been a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Lampshade
customer_reviews.text: This perfect lampshade arrived today in perfect condition...very carefully packed to protect it. Bought it so I could get better light from the lamp as the previous one was paper backed and only let light out the top and bottom. Bought new LED bulbs and wanted the most light possible. This is the perfect shade to do just that. Had to use the old harp because my arthritis hands could not squeeze the strong, new one, but the fit is perfect, so no problem. The next owner of the older lampshade will have a nice, shiny new harp and we both will be happy. Will gladly do business with these sellers again.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Wysock

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade Replacement - Much more light transmitted
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Stiffle lampshade which was abut 20 years old and yellowing - this new lampshade, which is much whiter, transmits a lot more light from a 100 watt equivalent (18 watt LED) making the room much brighter. I definitely accomplished what I set out to do!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome shade. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and shape. But what I love the most is the white color is actually really white. The old shade was white too, but it looked off white almost yellow. This is a nice bright white. Seems like a well build shade. The fan of is well attached. The plastic shade material is nice and think. It even came with a new harp, although my old harp was a bit taller and looked better on my lamp. Very well packaged. Came in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopperDavidTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace a lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: It's a white pleated-fabric lamp shade. Not quite big enough for the lamp and would have preferred off-white/beige to coordinate with other lamps, but it's the closest I could find to match the one it replaced. Just a comment about lamp shades in general - prices seem exorbitant for what you get (clothes hanger wire, cardboard and fabric), and I can never seem to find the exact size or style needed at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shade, came with an 8" harp and top ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shade, came with an 8" harp and top nob. I was so surprised to see the added pieces to the shade. I made it extremely worth it as you would have to buy the harp and top nob and that could easily cost you $10-$15 extra after the price of the shade. It really the perfect size for what we wanted and looks great on a lamp that sits on a side table. THANK YOU SELLER!!
customer_reviews.author: Smoggy66

customer_reviews.title: The product offers exactly what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the appearance. The lamp shade that we had was old and dingy looking and made the lamp look old (which it is). But a new shade with a different shape and off white color really brightened the lamp and it looks great. Didn't have to buy a new lamp.
customer_reviews.author: pwi

customer_reviews.title: Lamps Plus exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Lamps Plus exceeded my expectations. The lamp shade was super securely wrapped and protected. I'm very glad Lamps Plus wrote that a correct size harp was included with the shade. They know their business. My old harp didn't work with this new shade. I'm very happy with my purchase. I will definitely buy from Lamps Plus again.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdie

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful shade and exactly what I was looking for to ...
customer_reviews.text: This shade arrived on time and carefully packaged. It is a beautiful shade and exactly what I was looking for to replace an old damaged shade that was an original that came with the lamp... I am very pleased with this purchase and will be sure to purchase from this vendor again in the future...
customer_reviews.author: map

customer_reviews.title: I love this lampshade and will order more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lampshade!! It’s so pretty in white and extremely well made. The company packed did an exceptional job packing it in the box. My package started it’s journey in CA and made it to NY without a single dent to box or lampshade! Definitely purchase this lampshade!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Nice lampshade for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a lampshade that I had purchased about 8-10 years ago, when I received this shade it was just like my previous shade. The inside is a hard plastic which is covered with the pleated material on the outside. I was replacing because my previous shade had discolored a tiny bit over the years but primarily because the plastic inside had started to crack and break apart, although I thought for 8 years or so, it held up way with kids and time
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice well made shade
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shade for the money. Is definitely a true white color as mentioned in other reviews. Was packaged well and arrived in perfect condition. Was just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wheelbarger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: On opening the box I saw that the shade was very well packed -- quite impressive. Of course the shade was in perfect condition and looks just right...terrific in fact. The price was great and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp shade at a great price. I ordered a pleated shade for an antique lamp. This shade was the perfect complement, I was surprised at the high quality based on the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well packaged and delivered on time. Looks just like what I wanted and the light is so much brighter now. Dimensions are perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a shade for this particular lamp for a while, whenever I did find one it was either the wrong size, cost too much or both. This fits perfectly!

product_meta.title: Vintage Empire Lamp Shade with Harp Pleated Cone White Fabric 6.5x15x11 (Spider) - Brentwood
product_meta.description: From the Brentwood lamp shade collection. Antique white shade with pleats. Brass finish spider. From the Brentwood lamp shade collection.- 6 1/2" across the top x 15" across the bottom x 11" on the slant x 10 1/2" high overall.- Brass finish spider fitting.- Antique white mushroom pleat fabric.- A Brentwood brand lamp shade.- The correct size harp is included with this shade.
feature_bullets: 6 1/2" across the top x 15" across the bottom x 11" on the slant x 10 1/2" high overall.
The correct size harp is included with this shade.
